thread.title: MUST SEE: Larry David as Bernie Sanders on 'SNL'
thread.title_full: MUST SEE: Larry David as Bernie Sanders on 'SNL'

title: MUST SEE: Larry David as Bernie Sanders on 'SNL'
text:
MUST SEE: Larry David as Bernie Sanders on 'SNL' Note: For app users, this story is best viewed in a web browser. Post to Facebook MUST SEE: Larry David as Bernie Sanders on 'SNL' Note: For app users, this story is best viewed in a web browser. Check out this story on wtsp.com: http://on.wtsp.com/1RRqwFu Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs MUST SEE: Larry David as Bernie Sanders on 'SNL' Hoai-Tran Bui, USA TODAY 8:15 a.m. EDT October 19, 2015 Like two brothers from another Brooklyn mother. (Photo: Getty, Screengrab) 
Note: For app users, this story is best viewed in a web browser. 
Just think -- you have never seen Larry David and Bernie Sanders in the same room at once. 
But yes, Larry David WAS Bernie Sanders in the cold open for the show -- which had Kate McKinnon absolutely slaying as Hillary Clinton and Alec Baldwin menacing about as Jim Webb. 
It was probably one of the best political cold opens on Saturday Night Live in a while, with golden lines like, "I think you’re really gonna like the Hillary Clinton my team and I have created for this debate,” from McKinnon, whose Hillary just becomes more and more hilariously unhinged. 
But no one launched more conspiracy theories than Larry David's impression of Bernie Sanders. Probably because they are the same person. Larry David as Bernie Sanders is stunningly perfect. — Philip Bump (@pbump) October 18, 2015 Larry David doing a better Bernie Sanders than the real Bernie Sanders on #SNL . pic.twitter.com/gUixYldfNF — Roger Simon (@politicoroger) October 18, 2015 #SNL making the internet's collective dream/meme come true with Larry David as Bernie Sanders. — Jonathon Dornbush (@jmdornbush) October 18, 2015 LARRY DAVID AS BERNIE SANDERS ON SNL IS THE GREATEST THING I HAVE EVER SEEN — Mark Scoff (@makinmymark22) October 18, 2015 Larry David as Bernie Sanders should win someone a casting lifetime achievement award.
